Html:
Why would I start getting this, when I haven't made any changes to anything to do with mappings?  Note: I have another build on the laptop that isn't using lastest drop that works just fine.

In earlier drops there were a few issues with the MEF integration into Prism (we think we've gotten them worked out but we may have missed one).  If you try drop 7 do you still have this issue?
